TopicTitle: Loading Very Slow Bug, caused by Hamachi

Articles.Content: Back in the old days, there was bug where when other networks that are not currently in use will slow down loading of the game extremely. Now, in 1.1 the bug is back. Just to mention, I made this thread so people who experience these problems know there is an easy workaround for this. Just disable the unused network.

35 minutes ago, Djolox said:

Back in the old days, there was bug where when other networks that are not currently in use will slow down loading of the game extremely. Now, in 1.1 the bug is back. Just to mention, I made this thread so people who experience these problems know there is an easy workaround for this. Just disable the unused network.

There really wasn't much point in you posting this, considering the issue is already mentioned in one of the sticky threads in this sub-forum:

As far as I'm aware, this has been an issue in every version of KSP since I started playing (0.23).

Unfortunately, people having a slow loading issue are rather unlikely to find this thread as people don't generally bother to search first at all (or even read the sticky thread mentioned that talks about known issues), this thread isn't exactly named very helpfully if they do search and it will probably drop off the front page fairly quickly so is unlikely to be stumbled across.

1 minute ago, Padishar said:

There really wasn't much point in you posting this, considering the issue is already mentioned in one of the sticky threads in this sub-forum:

As far as I'm aware, this has been an issue in every version of KSP since I started playing (0.23).

Unfortunately, people having a slow loading issue are rather unlikely to find this thread as people don't generally bother to search first at all (or even read the sticky thread mentioned that talks about known issues), this thread isn't exactly named very helpfully if they do search and it will probably drop off the front page fairly quickly so is unlikely to be stumbled across.

I will change the name to "Loading Slow-Down Bug". That may be at least a bit more helpful.

EDIT: In updates between .25 and 1.0, I didn't notice the bug, even that hamachi was running all the time.

 

Edited April 25, 2016 by Djolox

It doesn't hurt anyone for @Djolox to help people find this issue.

Here is the Unity page on this issue.

The www class is still required for addons to load, so this issue will remain.
